inventoryItem.itemDescription: A machine gun forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

steps.nodeStepDescription: This weapon causes Void Damage.
This weapon causes Solar Damage.
This weapon causes Arc Damage.

Less recoil. 
Penalty to range.

More predictable recoil. 
 Slight boosts to range and Impact. 
More recoil.

Predictable and controllable recoil.
Penalty to range.
This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
Reload this weapon even faster.

Ceramic-jacketed rounds ricochet on hard surfaces.
Their extreme density lets you carry more rounds in reserve.
Added mass slows down weapon handling.
Increases Attack Power, allowing this weapon to cause more damage.
Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.
Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.
Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.
Reloading this weapon after a kill grants a damage bonus for a short time.
Expect to find more ammo for this weapon.
A kill with the final round in the magazine increases reload speed.
This weapon has increased stability.
This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.
Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.
Reduces the severity of this weapon’s recoil.
Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.
This weapon grows more accurate the longer it is fired.
Gain bonus accuracy while crouched.
